approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description. The description field should accept a minimum of 1 character and a maximum of 255 characters.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user. The list should display the task descriptions in a readable format.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load within 3 seconds on a standard internet connection (5 Mbps download, 1 Mbps upload) on a modern web browser.

requirements.title: Secure User Data
requirements.description: The application shall protect user data from unauthorized access. All sensitive data, including task descriptions, shall be stored securely and transmitted over HTTPS.
